protein.specific_function: Very active and specific thyroid hormone transporter. Stimulates cellular uptake of thyroxine (T4), triiodothyronine (T3), reverse triiodothyronine (rT3) and diidothyronine. Does not transport Leu, Phe, Trp or Tyr

reference.reference_text: Lafreniere RG, Carrel L, Willard HF: A novel transmembrane transporter encoded by the XPCT gene in Xq13.2. Hum Mol Genet. 1994 Jul;3(7):1133-9.
